title: API Docs
content: Welcome API documentation

title: Account

title: Analyses
content: Analyses results given Virtool analytical pipelines single sample  complete analysis document   api analyses  analysis_id Example  api analyses uskrqsxm Response Status  200 OK    id    uskrqsxm    ready   true   created_at    2017 10 03T21 35 54 813000Z    job      id    afovbrnx      algorithm    pathoscope_bowtie    sample      id    kigvhuql    name    Test 1      index      id    qldihken    version   0     user      id    igboyes      read_count   23953   diagnosis         Remove Remove existing analysis  request will fail  409 Conflict  analysis progress  Cancel associated job first  DELETE  api analyses  analysis_id Example DELETE  api analyses  analysis_id Response Status  204 No content BLAST Contig BLAST contig generated part NuVs analysis  request will fail  400 Bad Request  non NuVs analyses  PUT  api analyses  analysisid  sequenceindex blast Example PUT  api analyses yzgqgbld 5 blast Response Status  200 OK    rid    7M1MFYJ5014    ready   false   lastcheckedat    2018 02 06T19 48 33 500000Z    interval   3   Remove BLAST Remove BLAST record NuVs contig  request will fail  400 Bad Request  non NuVs analyses  DELETE  api analyses  analysisid  sequenceindex blast Example DELETE  api analyses  analysisid  sequenceindex blast Response 204 No content

title: Authentication
content: Explanation Virtool uses API keys authentication  API endpoints will return  403 Unauthorized  requests without valid authentication  First  will need create API key permission scope defined you  account documentation learn create API keys  Using API key authentication easy familiar developers made use HTTP based APIs  When making requests  use Basic authentication provide username API key  Examples curl curl  X  u igboyes 74e8b0d15ded4c538c66fce3922d415a https   demo virtool ca api account Python  requests  import requests requests auth import HTTPBasicAuth basic_auth   HTTPBasicAuth  igboyes    74e8b0d15ded4c538c66fce3922d415a   requests get  http   localhost 9950 api account   auth basic_auth  Javascript  fetch  let headers   new Headers    headers append  Authorization   Basic   btoa  igboyes 74e8b0d15ded4c538c66fce3922d415a     fetch  http   localhost 9950 api account    method   GET   headers    then resp    resp json     then json    console log json

title: Errors
content: JSON Errors JSON input cannot parsed  results  400 Bad Request  response  No information provided response  so sure JSON formatted properly     id    invalid_json    message    Invalid JSON    Authorization Errors endpoints  authorized session required  Authorized sessions obtained logging browser  Accessing user specific endpoints  GET  api account  without authorized session will result following error     id    requires_login    message    Requires login    Validation Errors JSON input data POST PUT endpoints URL queries validated using Cerberus  Validation errors will result  422 Unprocessable Entity  response  response data includes default Cerberus error report  Refer Cerberus documentation     id    invalid_input    message    Invalid input    errors      foo_bar     unknown field     new_password     required field     old_password     required field       example   foobar field not expected request  required newpassword   old_password  fields missing request  Refer input definition tables endpoint documentation sure inputs valid

title: Genbank
content: Provides endpoints interacting NCBI Genbank via Virtool server    get  Virtool style sequence document given accession  data retrieved GenBank converted palatable format   api genbank  accession Example  api genbank KJ406323 Response Status  200 OK    id    KJ406323    definition    Tobacco mosaic virus isolate TMV tNK coat protein    sequence    ATGTCTTACAGTATCACTACTCCATCTCAGTTCGTGTTCTTGTCATCAGCGZ       host    Solanum lycopersicum

manage_users   true   modify_hmm   true   modify_settings   true   modify_subtraction   true   modify_virus   true   rebuild_index   true   remove_file   true   remove_job   true   remove_virus   true   upload_file   true         id     technician    permissions      cancel_job   false   create_sample   false   manage_users   false   modify_hmm   false   modify_settings   false   modify_subtraction   false   modify_virus   false   rebuild_index   false   remove_file   false   remove_job   false   remove_virus   false   upload_file   false         get  complete representation single user group   api groups  group_id Example  api groups administrator Response Status  200 OK    permissions      cancel_job   true   create_sample   true   manage_users   true   modify_hmm   true   modify_settings   true   modify_subtraction   true   modify_virus   true   rebuild_index   true   remove_file   true   remove_job   true   remove_virus   true   upload_file   true     id    administrator    Create   create  Create new group  New groups no permissions  Requestors  modify_users  permission  POST  api groups Input   Name   Type   Description                                                                         group_id   string   unique id display name group   Example POST  api groups    group_id    foobar    Response Status 201  Created    permissions      cancel_job   false   create_sample   false   manage_users   false   modify_hmm   false   modify_settings   false   modify_subtraction   false   modify_virus   false   rebuild_index   false   remove_file   false   remove_job   false   remove_virus   false   upload_file   false     id    foobar    Update Permissions   set_permissions  Update permissions existing group  Requestors  modify_users  permission  Unset permissions will retain previous setting  PATCH  api groups  id Input   Name   Type   Description                                                                                               add_sample   boolean   members add samples     modify_sample   boolean   members modify samples sufficient rights     cancel_job   boolean   members cancel job     remove_job   boolean   members remove job documents     modify_virus   boolean   members add modify virus documents     remove_virus   boolean   members remove virus documents     rebuild_index   boolean   members rebuild virus indexes     modify_hmm   boolean   members add modify hmm annotations files     modify_host   boolean   members add modify host documents files     remove_host   boolean   members remove host documents files     modify_options   boolean   members modify global options   Example PATCH  api groups foobar    permissions      modify_virus   true   remove_job   true     Response Status  200 OK    permissions      cancel_job   false   create_sample   false   manage_users   false   modify_hmm   false   modify_settings   false   modify_subtraction   false   modify_virus   true   rebuild_index   false   remove_file   false   remove_job   true   remove_virus   false   upload_file   false     id    foobar    Remove   remove  Remove existing group  Requestors  modify_users permission  request will fail 400 Bad Request  built in administrator group  DELETE  api groups  group_id Example DELETE  api groups foobar Response Status  204 No Content

title: History
content: Read modify virus history  Find   find  List virus changes recent changes first  parameters optional   api history Parameters   Name   Type   Default   Description                                                                                page   integer   1   page number results return     per_page   integer   15   number documents return per page   Example  api history page 1 per_page 2 Response Status  200 OK    page   1   per_page   2   found_count   1542   page_count   771   total_count   1542   documents        method_name    create    description    Created Switchgrass mosaic associated virus 1    created_at    2018 02 01T00 28 32 985000Z    virus      id    2a9b332c    name    Switchgrass mosaic associated virus 1    version   0     index      id    jiwncaqr    version   0     user      id    igboyes      id    2a9b332c 0        method_name    create    description    Created Sweet potato virus G    created_at    2018 02 01T00 28 32 950000Z    virus      id    4ff7c77d    name    Sweet potato virus G    version   0     index      id    jiwncaqr    version   0     user      id    igboyes      id    4ff7c77d 0          get  complete representation single virus change   api history  change_id Example  api history c93ec9a9 1 Response Status  200 OK    method_name    edit    description    Removed abbreviation ABTV    created_at    2018 02 06T20 05 31 301000Z    virus      id    c93ec9a9    name    Abaca bunchy top virus    version   1     index      id    unbuilt    version    unbuilt      user      id    igboyes      diff        change    abbreviation      ABTV              change    version     0  1         id    c93ec9a9 1    Revert   revert  Revert specific change changes occurred it  Changes included index builds cannot reverted  DELETE  api history  change_id Example DELETE  api history c93ec9a9 1 Response Status  204 No Content

return per page   Example  api samples find test page 1 Response Status  200 OK    documents        name    Test 1    isolate        host        nuvs   true   pathoscope   true   created_at    2018 02 01T00 29 44 867000Z    imported   false   archived   false   user      id    igboyes      id    htosefxu        total_count   1   found_count   1   page_count   1   per_page   15   page   1   complete title: Uploads
content: When uploads required Virtool  targeted   upload   available endpoints are  Situation   Endpoint                                                                           Upload import Virtool viruses export file    upload viruses Upload Illumina read file    upload reads Upload  hmm file use NuVs    upload hmm Upload host FASTA file    upload host Upload file   upload  Uploads file Virtool file manager  file will given unique ID composed 8 character random alphanumeric string supplied  name  query parameter separated dash  POST  upload  file_type name filename Parameters   Name   Type   Optional   Description                                                                                name   string   false   display name file   Response Status  201 Created    id     iqdhxivo viruses json gz    name     viruses json gz    type     viruses    user       id     igboyes      uploaded_at     2017 12 07T19 09 26 147Z    expires_at     2017 12 08T00 09 26 147Z    created    true   reserved    false   ready    true   size    3709347   Delete Upload   delete  Delete previously uploaded file  DELETE  api files  file_id Response Status  204 No content

title: Installation
content: System Requirements   system_requirements  recommend following minimum specifications running Virtool server  Linux operating system 32 GB RAM 1 TB fast storage 1 Gb network connection Higher CPU clock speeds core counts will allow operations run parallel  Browsers   browsers  Virtool works best modern evergreen browsers including Chrome  Firefox  Safari  Edge  Internet Explorer not supported  Installing Server   installingtheserver  start using Virtool  installed system  Download latest Virtool release Virtool website  Unpack downloaded archive  tar  xvf virtool tar gz Move unpacked directory installation location  mv virtool  opt Run background using nohup  nohup   run   Note suggest running Virtool dedicated user  MongoDB   mongodb  Virtool uses MongoDB v3 4 0  database service  will MongoDB running starting Virtool  highly recommend installing updating MongoDB Linux package manager  MongoDB documentation provides step by step instructions installing MongoDB common Linux distributions  Install Ubuntu Install Debian Install SUSE Install Red Hat Once installed MongoDB  ensure running issuing following command  sudo service mongod status will receive output similar following MongoDB running    mongod service   High performance  schema free document oriented database Loaded  loaded   etc systemd system mongod service  disabled  vendor preset  enabled  Active  active  running  Fri 2017 04 21 15 55 59 PDT  2s ago Main PID  11844  mongod  Tasks  14 Memory  31 1M CPU  95ms CGroup   system slice mongod service   11844  usr bin mongod   quiet   config  etc mongod conf External Software   external_software  Virtool relies number common bioinformatics programs  available PATH so Virtool find them  will encounter errors programs not available    Name   Version   Purpose                            Skewer   0 2 2   Read trimming quality control     FastQC   v0 11 5   Calculating quality metrics sample libraries     Bowtie2   2 3 2   High throughput read alignment     SPAdes   v3 8 1   De novo assembly     HMMER   3 1b2   Motif detection

title: Known Issues
content: Inotify exception Problem fatal error message similar following when starting Virtool  inotify calls InotifyError  Call failed  should not  1     1  ERRNO  0  Solution Virtool uses inotify keep track changes files its data watch paths  error indicates system inotify watch limit low  increase it  Open   etc sysctl conf  Add update following configuration line  fs inotify maxuserwatches   524288 Save changes using following command sudo sysctl  p   system Missing libtbb so 2 Problem error similar following  bowtie inspect  error loading shared libraries  libtbb so 2  cannot open shared object file  No file directory Solution Install missing package  using recommended operating system Debian  issue following command terminal  apt get install libtbb dev using different operating system consult its documentation information installing packages  No history item description Problem history items web interface description  No Description   Solution no solution now  future release will repair legacy history records show correct description

title: Reverse Proxy
content: using HTTPS running Virtool public server  suggest running behind reverse proxy server NGINX  NGINX Warning not currently possible load balance one Virtool instance using NGINX load balancer reverse proxy server  Virtool makes use Websockets  advanced configuration NGINX required  First  sure running least version 1 3 13 NGINX  used following nginx conf serve Virtool behind NGINX using Websockets HTTPS  user www data  worker_processes 1  error_log  var log nginx error log  pid  var run nginx pid  events   worker_connections 768  use epoll    http   upstream frontends   server 127 0 0 1 9950    upstream websockets   server 127 0 0 1 9950    include  etc nginx mime types  default_type application octet stream  access_log  var log nginx access log  keepalive_timeout 65  proxyreadtimeout 200  sendfile on  tcp_nopush on  tcp_nodelay on  gzip on  gzipminlength 1000  gzip_proxied any  gzip_types text plain text html text css text xml application x javascript application xml application atom xml text javascript  proxynextupstream_error  entry redirecting non HTTPS  server   listen 80 default_server  listen      80 default _server  Replace FQDN fully qualified domain name server_name Replace FQDN fully qualified domain name  return 301 https      entry serving HTTPS traffic  server   Listen default HTTPS port  listen 443 ssl  Allow uploads 5 GB size  required uploading read files etc  clientmaxbody_size 5000M  Replace DOMAIN_NAME domain name  eg  virtool ca   server_name   Security configuration  ssl_certificate   sslcertificattekey   ssl_protocols TLSv1 TLSv1 1 TLSv1 2  Forward regular HTTPS traffic  location     proxypassheader Server  proxysetheader Host  http_host  proxy_redirect off  proxysetheader X Real IP  remote_addr  proxysetheader X Scheme  scheme  proxy_pass http   frontends    Forward Websocket traffic  location  ws   proxy_pass http   websocket  proxyhttpversion 1 1  proxysetheader Upgrade  http_upgrade  proxysetheader Connection  upgrade         configuration assumes that  running Virtool instance host NGINX Virtool instance listening default 9950 port using HTTPS fully qualified domain name Ensure SSL not configured Virtool  SSL settings section look this

title: Setup
content: Run installing Virtool  server started issuing following command Virtool install directory    run Use    run   help  overview additional command line arguments Virtool accept  default  server listens  localhost 9950   When visit address first time  will confronted one time setup interface  will allow configure essential settings required Virtool run  section completed  its Required label will change Ready  Once sections ready Save Reload button clicked  restarting server presenting login interface user  Connect MongoDB   mongodb  MongoDB installed running use Virtool  Once MongoDB ready  configure connection using following form  Error messages will appear connection fails provided database name already exists  Note advanced MongoDB configurations  including improved security features  will available future releases  Add First User   first_user  administrative user account created during setup  setup  account used add user accounts populate Virtool data  first user account added using following form  Important strongly recommend not making account generic adminstrative account  Doing so defeats Virtool s built in auditing  designed accordance ISO 17025 2005  account correspond individual user  Set Data Path   data_path  data path Virtool stores bioinformatic data including uploaded Illumina libraries  imported sample data  reference indexes  data path storage location offers good speed  capacity  redundancy  Paths beginning     will assumed absolute paths  paths will interpreted relative Virtool installation directory  default data path will set  data  will created Virtool installation directory  configuration used testing purposes  Errors will occur if  executing user does not permission write data path multi level directory tree created satify data path setting data path already exists not empty Set Watch Path   watch_path  primary method making Illumina FASTQ files available Virtool sample creation uploading web interface  possible set path accessible server will watched new read files  FASTQ files dropped watch directory will pulled Virtool made available sample creation  Warning Files dropped watch directory will removed once pulled Virtool  not place copy sample FASTQ file watch path  Save Restart Once setup sections completed  Save Restart button will enabled  Clicking will create populate data watch directories  create first user  write configuration file called  settings json  Virtool installation directory  server will restart login first time

title: HMMs
content: Introduction   introduction  Profile hidden Markov models  HMM  used Virtool discover potential novel viruses sequencing data  models used identify known viral motifs translated open reading frames derived sequencing data  method depends NuVs bioinformatic pipeline  Virtool  profile HMMs stored file   hmm profiles hmm  file generated HMMER  piece software used generating searching profile HMMs  profiles hmm  file contains number models generated clustered amino acid sequences sourced GenBank  Virtool easy use possible  distribute official set models derived vFam project  models not carry biological annotations  provide comprehensive set annotations models calculated metadata associated amino acid sequences used build models  Offical HMM file releases manually downloaded repository  Using Official Models   official_models  highly recommend using official models annotations  easy obtain use data without leaving Virtool  Go HMMs main navigation bar  no annotations  profiles hmm  does not exist  will following  Click Download button begin downloading data  time  When download complete  data will imported Virtool browse annotations use NuVs analysis algorithm  Browsing Annotations   browsing_annotations  browse annotations used NuVs results  Go HMMs main navigation bar  Use search bar find HMMs annotative name  eg  RNA replicase   Click HMM item view its details  will following view

title: Build a Virus Database
content: Virtool built detecting viruses  collection viral sequences used purpose key Virtool s mission  viral database fresh install Virtool completely empty  least one valid virus added database order start analyzing samples  1  Importing Virus Database   importing  Instead starting virus database scratch  one time import someone else s database offical one  Note virus database file imported empty instance Virtool  cannot import viruses already populated database  will use offical database tutorial  Go Virtool downloads page download latest database release  Click download link  viruses json gz  file  Virtool  go main Viruses view  following  Click Import link bring following dialog  Drag select downloaded  viruses json gz  file  Information contents file will shown  Click Import button start import process  progress bar will appear  Refresh browser imported data doesn t appear when progress bar finishes  2  Browsing Viruses   browsing  Go Viruses main navigation menu no viruses created  something this  3  Creating Virus   creating  Creating first virus requires name  optionally provide abbreviation  Click bring dialog creating viruses  Enter name abbreviation new virus  Save new virus  virus appear virus manager  4  Adding Isolate   addinganisolate  Isolates sequence data organized within virus record  maintain continuity virus sequence records Genbank  isolates Virtool identified source type source name  two fields concatenated form isolate s name  Examples source types are  isolate  genotype  culture  Examples source names are  A  Canada  8801 VLH  anything really  Click virus entry  note red notification top page  indicates virus cannot used analyses until listed issues corrected  Click near Isolates heading bring dialog creating isolates  Notice Isolate Name field changes two fields  will display name isolate  Save changes  new isolate appear isolate editor  edit remove isolate clicking   5  Adding Sequence   addingasequence  Sequences members isolates  isolates will one sequence  virus question multipartite  one sequence assigned isolate  Click near Sequences heading bring dialog creating sequences  Fill form fields  Host field optional  pull sequence records GenBank entering valid GenBank accession Accession field clicking   Save new virus  will appear isolate editor  Click sequence entry expand view data associated sequence record  6  Building Index   buildinganindex  imported data used analyses  optimized index built  Think publication commit step  Viruses view look something following  yellow alert shown changes made database  Click Rebuild index link go indexes view  Click Rebuild button prepare index build  dialog describing changes built will appear  Click Start button bottom dialog start index build job  new index entry will appear  index ready use when Active label
